title: how funny would it be to have a 500ad+ rengar or xin with...
body: morde, galio, orianna as teammates. suddenly this deadly ass rengar who would usually die instantly, jumps into a 1v5 with 250+ bonus armor and MR and shreds everything. Not even including the ori ult wombo from stealth. awww man if i had friends i would so try this.

replies.body: There's no point having 500 ad as Rengar without armor penetration which is why you'd build all armor penetration items on him.
Why not yasuo? Or yi? Also add lulu or zilean to the teammates :^)
